info.title: OData Service for namespace Default
info.description: This OData service is located at http://localhost:5281/

/Customer.description: Provides operations to manage the collection of Customer entities.

/Customer/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/OptimizationResult/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

/$metadata.description: Provides operations to obtain the service metadata.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.Optimizati.title: OptimizationResult

TotalRideDurationMinutes.description: Sum of all routes Ride time in minutes

TotalRoutesDurationMinutes.description: Sum of all routes time in minutes

TotalRideDistanceKm.description: Sum of all routes ride distance in km

UnassignedShipments.description: Shipments not assigned to any route

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.Optimizati.description: Represents the result of the optimization

Optiways.Routes.Models.Data.Customer.title: Customer

Id.description: The unique identifier of the customer (CustNo).

Name.description: The full name of the customer (CustName).

City.description: The city where the customer is located.

CountryCode.description: The two-letter country code for the customer's location.

ShipmentPostCode.description: The postal code where the customer's shipments are sent (ShipPost).

Optiways.Routes.Models.Data.Customer.description: Represents a customer in the system.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.OrderItemD.title: OrderItemDetails

Id.description: The unique identifier of the order item.

Quantity.description: The quantity of the order item.

Location.description: The location of the order item.

Order.description: The order associated with the order item.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.OrderItemD.description: Represents the details of an order item in the system.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.OrderDetai.title: OrderDetails

Id.description: The unique identifier of the order.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of the order.

Customer.description: The customer associated with the order.

Vehicle.description: The vehicle associated with the order.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.OrderDetai.description: Represents the details of an order in the system.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.UnitOfMeas.title: UnitOfMeasurement

Code.description:
The code for the unit of measurement (UOM). Possible values are:
            - Ct: Carton
            - Tin: Tin
            - BTL: Bottle
            - Box: Box
            - PKT: Packet
            - BAG: Bag

PackageSize.description: The package size for the unit of measurement.

BaseQuantity.description: The base quantity for the unit of measurement.

Length.description: The length of the unit of measurement.

Width.description: The width of the unit of measurement.

Height.description: The height of the unit of measurement.

Item.description: The order item details associated with the unit of measurement.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.UnitOfMeas.description: Represents a unit of measurement in the system.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Data.Vehicle.title: Vehicle

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence number of the vehicle.

Branch.description: The branch to which the vehicle belongs.

DistrictCode.description: The district code of the vehicle.

PostCode.description: The postal code of the vehicle.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Data.Vehicle.description: Represents a vehicle in the system.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.Optimizati.title: Route

RouteSections.description: Gets or sets the route sections.

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.Optimizati.description: Represents a Route in the ride. A route contains several Route.

CostPerMinuteOfDrive.description: The cost per minute of drive

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.Optimizati.title: RouteSection

StartRideTime.description: Start ride time from SourceAddress to TargetAddress

PickupDelaySeconds.description: Time to load the shipments to the truck

DropDelaySeconds.description: Time to drop the shipments at the TargetAddress

Optiways.Routes.Models.Output.Optimizati.description: Represents a section in the Route

Default.ODataErrors.InnerError.description: The structure of this object is service-specific
